snippet: The Juilliard Orchestra performed two pieces that faced rejection when they were first written.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by the Julliard Orchestra of composer William Walton's Viola Concerto at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Juilliard Orchestra performed two pieces that faced rejection when they were first written.

headline.seo: Juilliard Orchestra at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: A Concert of Two Works That Were Rejected at First and Embraced Later
headline.print_headline: A Concert of Two Works That Were Rejected at First and Embraced Later
